description: This file defines a React functional component 'Preview' that renders a sandboxed iframe for previewing raw HTML content. It sanitizes the input HTML by removing iframes, scripts, inline handlers, and certain IDs, and conditionally renders a placeholder message when the HTML is empty or when embedded within another iframe. The component is primarily used for safe previewing of HTML snippets within a React app.

methods.name: Preview({ html, height = 'calc(100vh - 64px - 32px)' })
methods.description: React component that renders a sanitized, sandboxed iframe displaying the provided HTML content, with safeguards against nested iframes and recursive previews.
